title: 🐛 Bug: Missing Exception Logging in Database Schema Initialization (Hacktoberfest)
body_summary:
### 🧩 Problem
In `memori/core/database.py`, if schema initialization fails, the fallback does not always log the full exception details (traceback, error message).

### 📋 Steps to Fix
- Update the err...

title: 🐛 Fix: Retry Decorator Edge Case Raises No Exception (Hacktoberfest)
body_summary:
### 🧩 Problem
In `memori/utils/helpers.py`, the retry decorator can raise a generic `MemoriError("Retry attempts exhausted")` even if there was a last exception. This could mask the real error.

### 📋...
